Blackfang smiled. He was indeed a bit hopeful that Kit Kat had been 
here, and Cam's confirmation was just what he needed.

When the alarms rang, he assumed what was going on.

Blackfang: That must be her. Cam, I want you to stay with Nightlight 
and Elita. You'll be their protector, okay? I have to check on 
Kitkat for now.

He hugged her again then stood up and left to meet Kitkat.
